ing: 1 pint strawberries - cleaned, hulled and sliced
des: "In a hurry?  Make this fruit salad in about 10 minutes.  You can add or subtract different fruit according to your taste and what is in season."
ins: In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, grapes, kiwis, and bananas. Gently mix in peaches.  Chill for 1 hour before serving.
